title: Pixel 6 April update fixes camera and wireless charging issues, available today
content:
Following last month’s two-week gap, the April’s security update is rolling out for the Pixel 6 on the same day as all other supported Google devices.

more…

The post Pixel 6 April update fixes camera and wireless charging issues, available today appeared first on 9to5Google.
